scripts.build:notifications: bash scripts/ts-bindings.sh && npm run build -w packages/notifications-dvm
scripts.build:profiles: bash scripts/ts-bindings.sh && npm run build -w packages/profiles-dvm
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:happ -w example && npm run build:happ:clone -w example && bash scripts/ts-bindings-example.sh
scripts.build:cell: bash scripts/ts-bindings.sh && npm run build -w packages/cell-proxy
scripts.build:libs: npm run build:cell && npm run build -w packages/lit-happ && npm run build -w packages/we-utils && npm run build:profiles && npm run build:notifications
scripts.devtest: npm run build:happ && npm run build:libs && npm run build -w example && npm run start
scripts.devtest:clone: npm run build:happ && npm run build:libs && npm run build -w example && npm run start:clone
scripts.publish:cell: npm run build:cell && cd packages/cell-proxy && npm publish
scripts.publish:lit: npm run build -w packages/lit-happ && cd packages/lit-happ && npm publish
scripts.publish:we: npm run build -w packages/we-utils && cd packages/we-utils && npm publish
scripts.publish:profiles: npm run build -w packages/profiles-dvm && cd packages/profiles-dvm && npm publish
scripts.publish:notifications: npm run build -w packages/notifications-dvm && cd packages/notifications-dvm && npm publish
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:cell && npm run publish:lit && npm run publish:we && npm run publish:profiles && npm run publish:notifications
